Are you unemployed, furloughed, or working reduced hours?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Are you having trouble paying for your rent, mortgage, or home maintenance fees?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Are you having trouble purchasing enough food to feed yourself or your family?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Please enter a whole number greater than zero

Count yourself, other adults and any dependents when answering these questions.

Is anyone in your home employed?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Please enter a whole number greater than zero

Is anyone aged 60 or older?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Is anyone 6-17 years old?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Is anyone 5 years old or younger?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Has anyone been diagnosed with COVID-19?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Count yourself and any dependents when answering these questions.

Does anyone in your home pay for dependent care?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Dependent care is money you pay someone to care for children or other people in your home who are disabled or elderly, so you can work, look for work, or attend school.

Is anyone pregnant?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Is anyone blind or disabled?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Is anyone an active member or honorably discharged veteran of the US Armed Forces?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"

Is anyone attending or planning to attend vocational school, college, or university either online or in person?

Please answer "Yes" or "No"
